text:
@Mike_Pence You were put in charge of the government's coronavirus task force and you utterly failed the American people.

And now you want to send our schoolchildren back to school without a plan for their safety?

"Sanctity of human life"?

It seems you find us utterly expendable. https://t.co/LkSrPilVJn
